thread.title: Making of Thoongaavanam's Neeye Unakku Raja song
thread.title_full: Making of Thoongaavanam's Neeye Unakku Raja song - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Making of Thoongaavanam's Neeye Unakku Raja song
text:
The making video of Neeye Unakku Raja song from Kamal Haasan's Tamil - Telugu bilingual neo-noir crime thriller film, Thoongaavanam, has been released for the fans. Directed by Rajesh M. Selva, the film stars Kamal Hassan, Trisha, Prakash Raj, Kishore and Asha Sarath. The film, which is a bi-lingual simultaneously shot in Telugu - language as Cheekati Rajyam with the same cast, was jointly produced by Raaj Kamal Films International and Sri Gokulam Movies.
